parameters.subject: You have a new applicant!
parameters.message:
= Application Notification

Hi {{ $json.fields['Recruiter Name'] }},

{{ $json.fields['Full Name'] }} has completed their application and is ready for screening. See details below:

Record ID: {{ $json.id }}

Applicant Details:

  • Name: {{ $json.fields['Full Name'] }}
  • Phone Number: {{ $json.fields['Phone Number'] }}
  • Email: {{ $json.fields.Email }}
  • Role Applied for: {{ $json.fields['Role Applied for'] }}
  • Application Status: {{ $json.fields['Application Status'] }}
  • Stage: {{ $json.fields.Stage }}

Resume: View Resume

Created: {{ $json.createdTime }}

parameters.subject: We've received your application!
parameters.message:
= Application Received

Hello {{ $json.fields['Full Name'] }},

Thank you for applying for the {{ $json.fields['Role Applied for'] }} position!

We've received your application and our team will review it carefully. If we decide to move forward with you, you'll hear from us within 2 business days.

In the meantime, feel free to reach out if you have any questions.

Best regards,
The Recruitment Team

parameters.subject: Congratulations!
parameters.message:
= Interview Invitation

Dear {{ $('Edit Fields1').item.json['candidate name'] }},

We're thrilled to inform you that you've successfully passed the initial screening stage! üöÄ

We were impressed by your application and would love to learn more about you. We've scheduled an interview to discuss your experience and explore how you might contribute to our team.

üìÖ Interview Details

üìÜ Date: {{ $now.setZone('Africa/Lagos').toFormat('EEEE, MMMM dd, yyyy') }}
üïê Time: {{ $json['Time zone'] }}
üíª Format: Virtual (Google Meet)
üé• Join Interview

üí° Preparation Tips

  • Test your camera and microphone beforehand
  • Ensure you have a stable internet connection
  • Find a quiet, well-lit space for the interview
  • Have a copy of your resume handy for reference
  • Prepare questions about the role and our company

Meeting ID: {{ $('Edit Fields1').item.json['Meeting ID'] }}

If you need to reschedule or have any questions, please don't hesitate to reach out to us at least 24 hours before the scheduled time.

We're looking forward to speaking with you!

Best regards,
The Recruitment Team
